title: Arduino Robot
content: I was the Hardware lead of a team that created a small Arduino Robot, and my role was to design it in TinkerCAD, 3d print it, and assemble it.

title: Scopebuddy GUI
content: I created a Graphical User Interface for a program known as Scopebuddy, providing a convenient way to use a tool that otherwise requires users to be able to locate and properly edit config files.

title: Responsive Intel Timeline
content: I developed a website that responsively adapts to any size of screen while also having excellent support for accessibility tools such as screen readers. It also automatically re-orders itself to properly display right-to-left languages.

title: Secure AI Assistant
content: I securely deployed an AI-powered chatbot using a Cloudflare Worker and the OpenAI API to help customers with questions exclusively about L'Or√©al products.

title: Hackjam
content: My team got first place in the category for worst-designed login screen. We used our understanding of the real goal (submit a funny video) to implement only features that would show up well on a video.

title: Bazzite Updater
content: I am creating a GUI system update application for Bazzite. It has full SDL3 controller support and will allow updating, rebasing, and rolling back updates.
